title: Safe Harbor
description: Reese Conlon, Lt.Col USMCR, is the new sheriff who has heads turning amidst speculation as to who will be the first woman to capture her attentions.Doctor Victoria King has been betrayed by love once and refuses to risk heartbreak again.Brianna Parker, the teenaged daughter of Reese's chief, fears her father's wrath when he learns that she loves another girl.As these three women struggle to live and love in freedom, they risk their hearts and souls to give one another a Safe Harbor.
author: Radclyffe
